embeddings module¶

class embeddings.EmbeddingsModel[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for embedding’s models.

get_vectors_dim() → int[source]¶
Returns

The dimension of the embeddings vectors.

get_word_vector(word: str)[source]¶

Returns the embedding vector of the given word. If the word is not present in the embedding’s model, a default numpy array full of zeros of the same size of the vectors in the embedding’s model is returned.

Parameters

word – Word to be converted as a vector.

Returns

The embedding vector of the given word.

class embeddings.Glove(vectors_dim=100, glove_dir='/Users/carlos/Desktop/Clase/4/2_Cuatri/TFG/Codigo/repo/embeddings/glove/glove.6B')[source]¶

Bases: embeddings.EmbeddingsModel

Glove word embedding model.

get_vectors_dim() → int[source]¶
Returns

The dimension of the embeddings vectors.

get_word_vector(word: str)[source]¶

Returns the glove vector of the given word. If the word is not present in the glove model, a default numpy array full of zeros of the same size of the vectors in the glove model is returned.

Parameters

word – Word to be converted as a vector.

Returns

The glove vector of the given word.

class embeddings.Word2VecModel(model_path='/Users/carlos/Desktop/Clase/4/2_Cuatri/TFG/Codigo/repo/embeddings/word2vec/GoogleNews-vectors-negative300.bin.gz', vectors_dim=300)[source]¶

Bases: embeddings.EmbeddingsModel

Word2Vec word embedding model.

get_keras_embedding(train_embeddings=False) → keras.layers.embeddings.Embedding[source]¶

Returns a keras embedding layer using the Word2Vec model.

Parameters

train_embeddings – If True, the embedding layer weights are updated during training.

Returns

The keras embedding layer using the Word2Vec model.

get_vectors_dim() → int[source]¶
Returns

The dimension of the embeddings vectors.

get_word_index(word: str) → int[source]¶

Returns the index of the specified word.

Parameters

word –

Returns

Index of the specified word. If the word isn’t in the vocabulary of the model, returns the index of the UNK token.

get_word_vector(word: str)[source]¶

Returns the word2vec vector of the given word. If the word is not present in the word2vec model, a default numpy array full of zeros of the same size of the vectors in the word2vec model is returned.

Parameters

word – Word to be converted as a vector.

Returns

The word2vec vector of the given word.
